text: "Difficult Love" is a song by Canadian artist City and Colour, from their sixth studio album A Pill for Loneliness. The song peaked at number 17 on the Canadian Rock Billboard chart. ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2020) !Peak position |- |Canada Rock |align="center"|17 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:City and Colour songs Category:Songs written by Dallas Green (musician) Category:2020 songs
title: Difficult Love (song)
